description: General schema for CV / resume documents.

fields.name: location
fields.description: City, region, or country of the candidate if available.

fields.name: headline
fields.description: Short title or headline summarizing the candidate (e.g., 'Senior Data Scientist').

fields.name: skills
fields.description: List of key skills or technologies.

fields.name: work_experience
fields.description: List of jobs or roles. Each may include employer, title, start_date, end_date, responsibilities.

fields.name: education
fields.description: List of educational records (institution, degree, field_of_study, start_date, end_date).

fields.name: projects
fields.description: Key projects or portfolio items mentioned in the resume.

fields.name: links
fields.description: URLs such as LinkedIn, GitHub, portfolio, or personal website.
